name: Datascape Lady - Ruirui
text: If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 "Datascape" card you control; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Level/Rank 3 or higher monsters, also send 1 "Datascape" card from your Deck to the GY with a different card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from the targeted card, and if you do, Special Summon this card, then you can add 1 "Datascape" card from your Deck to your hand with a different card type from the targeted card and the card you sent to the GY, except "Datascape Lady - Ruirui". You can only use this effect of "Datascape Lady - Ruirui" once per turn.
